title: The same domain name corresponds to multiple IPs in the hosts file, with an automatic switching mechanism
content: The operating system is Windows 11, and the following content is configured in the HOSTS file on the C drive: 192.168.10.10 www.simon.com 192.168.20.10 www.simon.com There are two private network servers providing website services, with server A's IP at 192.168.10.10 and server B's IP at 192.168.20.10. Then use Firefox to browse the website www.simon.com and set up Firefox's network.dnsCacheEntriesã€network.dnsCacheExpirationã€network.dnsCacheExpirationGracePeriod Three configuration items are 0. When accessing normally, www.simon.com points to 192.168.10.10. When the 192.168.10.10 server fails, will it redirect to 192.168.20.10. What is the latency for switching domain names in Firefox? What is the mechanism for switching?

title: Mozilla Firefox Crashed: Gah. Your tab just crashed
content:
We are experiencing an ongoing issue with Firefox that persists even after performing the following troubleshooting steps: - Uninstalled Firefox completely. - Removed all browser add-ons and extensions. - Reinstalled the latest version of Firefox. Despite these steps, the issue still occurs: Browser crashes, pages not loading, extension not working. Additional Information: - Operating System: Windows 11 Pro - Firefox Version: 145.0.1 - Error Message:

We would appreciate guidance on resolving this problem, as standard troubleshooting has not resolved it.

Thank you in advance for your assistance. Kind regards, Edward

title: Roblox
content:
Hello there,

Thank you for getting back to us.

Please try the steps listed in the General Roblox Website Issues help article starting with the â€œClear your Temporary Internet Files and Cookiesâ€ section.

If you are still experiencing this error, please check your emailâ€™s inbox in case youâ€™re seeing any password reset emails from our website. Make sure that you have checked your spam/junk folders for the email message. Also, add password_reset@roblox.com and @appmail.roblox.com to your email address permitted list. You may want to check your email providerâ€™s help guide for specific instructions on ensuring that you receive emails from a particular address or domain.
